name: Youtube (Unstable)
description: One of the biggest video platforms owned by Google
author: FUTO

settings.name: Use Login for Channels
settings.description: Use authenticated client for channel (videos) requests. (eg. for member videos)
settings.warningDialog:
Only enable this if you need it for channel membership content.

Try disabling if you have issues when loading channels.

settings.name: Use Login for video details
settings.description: Use authenticated client for video requests. (eg. for member videos)
settings.warningDialog:
Only enable this if you need it for channel membership content.

Try disabling if you have issues when loading videos and comments.

settings.name: Allow Loginfallback
settings.description: Allow usage of login in case where login required (eg. bot check)

settings.name: Provide Youtube Activity
settings.description: Use authenticated client for playback, telling Youtube what you watched.

settings.name: Only Use Channel RSS Feeds (Inferior)
settings.description: Exclusively use channel RSS feeds for channel content, may result in inferior results, and only recent videos. But may be faster and reduce rate limiting.
settings.warningDialog:
Using RSS feeds will have inferior results, and may add shorts in the channel videos and subscriptions.

Old videos may also be unavailable.

settings.name: Allow Age Restricted
settings.description: Allow watching of age restricted videos

settings.name: Allow Controversial Restricted
settings.description: Allow watching of controversial restricted videos

settings.name: Allow Member Content
settings.description: Allow listing of member content (will prefix "[MEMBER]")

settings.name: Force Experimental UMP Streams
settings.description: Force usage of experimental implementation of UMP. May be unstable and cost more performance.

settings.name: Use Aggressive UMP Recovery
settings.description: This feature allows UMP to refetch the entire page to recover from ip changes and such.

settings.name: Verify IOS Playback
settings.description:
This feature will check if iOS sources are playable beyond 60 seconds, or else fallback to other sources.
May add a minor delay on video load (< 0.2s)

settings.name: Show Verbose Messages
settings.description: Show messages that give more information about what is happening, might be considered annoying for some.

settings.name: Return Youtube Dislike
settings.description:
This is a third-party database of video dislikes that combines historic data, crowd-sourced data, and estimations, and may not be accurate.

(Using https://returnyoutubedislike.com)

settings.name: Enable
settings.description: Use Return YoutubeDislike to provide dislikes for videos

settings.name: SponsorBlock
settings.description:
This is NOT Adblock. SponsorBlock allows you to (automatically) skip in-video sponsor segments.
It will harm creators.

(Using https://sponsor.ajay.app)

FUTO respects your decision to use SponsorBlock. But only if you're supporting creators in other ways.

settings.name: Enable
settings.description:
If enabled support creators in other ways.
Do not freeload.
settings.warningDialog:
SponsorBlock will harm creators.
Do not freeload, support creators in other ways.

settings.name: Allow No Vote Segments
settings.description: Allow segments without votes, this may cause questionable video skips.

settings.name: Skip Sponsors
settings.description: Skip segments labeled as sponsors

settings.name: Skip Intros
settings.description: Skip segments labeled as intros

settings.name: Skip Outros
settings.description: Skip segments labeled as outros

settings.name: Skip Self-Promos
settings.description: Skip segments labeled as self-promos

settings.name: Skip Music-Offtopic
settings.description: Skip segments labeled as music-offtopic

settings.name: Skip Preview
settings.description: Skip segments labeled as previews

settings.name: Skip Fillers
settings.description: Skip segments labeled as fillers

settings.name: Advanced
settings.description: These are settings not intended for most users, but may help development or power users.

settings.name: Allow AV1
settings.description: Adds AV1 option when available, MAY NOT BE SUPPORTED YET!
settings.warningDialog: AV1 support might not work yet, this allows you to return the stream even if its not supported (for testing)

settings.name: Show Cipher every Video
settings.description: Shows a toast with the cipher when loading a video

settings.name: Show every new Botguard Token
settings.description: Shows a toast with the botguard token used changed

settings.name: Show every time UMP disconnects
settings.description: Shows a toast whenever UMP goes into a reconnection mode

settings.name: Allow UMP to reload plugin
settings.description: Allows the UMP protocol to reload a plugin if it deems required and supported.

settings.name: Allow experimental UMP backoff
settings.description: This enables an experimental backoff which waits when Youtube requires it. This may cause slower loading in some cases (even between videos)

settings.name: Allow experimental UMP backoff (async)
settings.description: Same as above setting, but only if async is supported

settings.name: Fallback to Trending for Home
settings.description: Fetches the trending page if the normal home page failed to load

settings.name: Use isInlinePlaybackNoAd
settings.description: May reduce playback blocking issues.

settings.name: Use isInlinePlaybackNoAd (when logged in)
settings.description: May reduce playback blocking issues. Long term effects unknown.

captcha.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/110.0.5481.153 Mobile Safari/537.36

authentication.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 12) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.6099.230 Mobile Safari/537.36
authentication.loginWarning: You must select a profile after login for authentication to complete.

258: Hotfix: Fix handling of invalid PlayerData from isInlinePlaybackNoAd after reload
257: Improvement: Fallback without setting if fails
Improvement: Hide certain messages behind verbose toasts
253: Improvement: Attempted bypassing of blocked playback
Fixed: Short-only playlists are now loadable
Fixed: No author names for playlist search
251: Fix: Fixed wrong offsets for UMP (affects downloaded videos)
Fix: Fixed UMP not being able to load if opened with a timestamp
Fix: Fixed planned videos not loading properly
Fix: Fixed playlists not appearing if using authentication for channels in some cases
Improvement: Error when comments are disabled
250: Fix: Consent form for search (with spaces)
244: Fix: Support additional video models (may fix home page for some)
237: Fix: Import Subscriptions on some accounts
Improvement: Playback tracker optimalization in certain scenarios
Improvement: Warning when toggling AV1 setting that it requires UMP for now
236: Fix Android 9 error (remove query hardware codecs)
234: Improvement: Filter member-only videos from channel contents
232: Feature: Verify IOS Playback setting (true by default), checks if iOS sources can be played beyond 60 seconds, or fallback to others.
Feature: Channel shorts fetching support (may require app update to view new channel tab)
231: Fix: UMP failing on initial load
227: Feature: UMP MP4 support (fixes no audio or only 360p for older videos)
Improve: UMP Disconnect toasts now optional
